articles.title: What Usha Vance’s rise to prominence means to other South Asian and Hindu Americans - The Associated Press
articles.description: Usha Chilukuri Vance has entered the spotlight this week as the wife of JD Vance, former President Trump’s running mate in the 2024 presidential election. Her rise comes at a time when there are prominent figures of South Asian descent in politics, including …
